profile.name: Anharits Pantito
profile.description: I’ve spent years building what works behind the scenes. Now I’m focused on how it feels on the screen
about_me: I’m a software developer with 3+ years of experience working mostly on the backend using Ruby on Rails—building APIs, shaping databases, and turning business requirements into things that actually work.
Lately, I’ve been moving closer to the frontend. Not because backend isn’t fun, but because great logic deserves a great interface, from that it has pulled me up into the Vue.js ecosystem.

desc: Developed and maintained multiple internal web systems using Ruby on Rails.
Designed and consumed API to facilitate seamless data synchronization.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into features.
Designed user flows and wireframes to visualize application structure.
Created high-fidelity mockups and prototypes using Figma.

projects.title: Employee Performance System
points: Developed a comprehensive dashboard for tracking employee KPIs.
Integrated JS libraries for interactive scoring forms and dynamic charts.
Implemented complex scoring algorithms on the backend.

projects.title: Online Shop Platform
points: Built a mobile-first product catalog focusing on transactional integrity.
Customized UI components for product cards and checkout flows.
Enhanced UX with JS interactions for cart and filtering without page reloads.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
points: Designed reactive personal portfolio to showcase professional projects.
Built modular UI components (Navbar, Cards) using Vue.js.
Utilized Vue Router for smooth client-side navigation (SPA).
